data.name: AdvancedReshapeTool_LogEnteringSketchMode
data.value: Sketch the reshape line to change the selection. - Press R to restore the sketch from the previous reshape operation. - Press S to toggle the non-default reshape side of the geometry. - Press [ESC] to select different features.

data.name: AdvancedReshapeTool_LogPromptForSelection
data.value:
Select one or more line or polygon features to reshape.
- Press and hold SHIFT to add or remove features from the existing selection.
- Press and hold P to draw a polygon that completely contains the features to be selected. Finish the polygon with double-click.
- Press [O] for additional options.
{0}

data.name: AdvancedReshapeTool_LogPromptForSelection_Enter
data.value: - Press Enter to re-use the existing selection.

data.name: CutPolygonAlongTool_LogPromptForSelection
data.value:
Select one or more line or polygon features to cut along other feature(s).
- Press and hold SHIFT to add or remove features from the existing selection.
- Press and hold P to draw a polygon that completely contains the features to be selected. Finish the polygon with double-click.

data.name: CutPolygonAlongTool_LogUsingCurrentSelection
data.value: Select the target line or polygon features to use as cut line.

data.name: RemoveOverlapsTool_AfterSelection
data.value:
{0}
Press [ESC] to select one or more different features.

data.name: RemoveOverlapsTool_Caption
data.value: Remove Overlaps

data.name: RemoveOverlapsTool_LogPromptForSelection
data.value:
Select one or more line or polygon features from which a part should be removed.
- Press and hold SHIFT to add or remove features from the existing selection.
- Press and hold P to draw a polygon that completely contains the features to be selected. Finish the polygon with double-click.

data.name: RemoveOverlapsTool_Message
data.value: Remove a part of a feature that overlaps with other polygon features.

data.name: MergeFeaturesTool_LogPromptForSelection
data.value: Select the first feature to merge{0}. Press [O] for options.

data.name: MergeFeaturesTool_LogUsingCurrentSelection
data.value:
Select the second feature to be merged with the first.
Press [ESC] to reselect the first feature.

data.name: MergeFeaturesTool_SurvivorFirstObject
data.value: (this feature will remain after the merge)

data.name: MergeFeaturesTool_SurvivorLargerObject
data.value: (the larger feature will remain after the merge)

data.name: ReshapeAlongTool_LogPromptForSelection
data.value:
Select one or more line or polygon features to align with other feature(s).
- Press and hold SHIFT to add or remove features from the existing selection.
- Press and hold P to draw a polygon that completely contains the features to be selected. Finish the polygon with double-click.

data.name: ReshapeAlongTool_LogUsingCurrentSelection
data.value:
Select the target line or polygon features to align with.
- Press [ESC] to select a different feature.

data.name: EraseTool_LogEnteringSketchMode
data.value:
Sketch a hole or any polygon to be erased from the selection.
Press [ESC] to reselect the polygon(s).

data.name: EraseTool_LogPromptForSelection
data.value:
Select one or more features.
- Press and hold SHIFT to add or remove features from the existing selection.
- Press and hold P to draw a polygon that completely contains the features to be selected. Finish the polygon with double-click.

data.name: SelectionTool_LogPromptForSelection
data.value: Select one or more features by clicking or dragging a box: - Press and hold SHIFT to add or remove features from the existing selection. - Press CTRL and drag a box to show a list of selectable feature classes. - Press ALT and click to select all features at the click point.

data.name: RemoveHoleTool_LogPromptForSelection
data.value: Select one or more polygon features which contain the hole(s) to be removed.

data.name: RemoveHoleTool_LogPromptForSelection1
data.value: Select one or more polygon features which contain the hole(s) to be removed.

data.name: FillHoleTool_LogPromptForSelection
data.value: Select a polygon that contains a hole or several polygons with a gap in between.

data.name: ChopperTool_LogPromptForSelection
data.value:
Select one or more line features to be chopped at intersections with other features.
- Press and hold SHIFT to add or remove features from the existing selection.
- Press and hold P to draw a polygon that completely contains the features to be selected. Finish the polygon with double-click.

data.name: CrackerTool_LogPromptForSelection
data.value:
Select one or more line or polygon features to crack. The cracking process inserts vertices at intersections with other features for topological correctness.
- Press and hold SHIFT to add or remove features from the existing selection.
- Press and hold P to draw a polygon that completely contains the features to be selected. Finish the polygon with double-click.

data.name: MergeFeaturesTool_Caption
data.value: Merge Features

data.name: MergeFeaturesTool_DisjointGeometries
data.value: The selected features cannot be merged. Reason(s): {0}.<br>Reselect the second feature or press [ESC] to start with a new merge operation.

data.name: MergeFeaturesTool_Message
data.value: Merges two features with the same geometry type.

data.name: MergeFeaturesTool_DisjointGeometriesList
data.value: The selected features cannot be merged. Reason(s): {0}
